reasoning: The test expected client-side input validation on the Measurement ID field that was never indicated in the UI. It flagged a 'potential' XSS vulnerability without demonstrating actual script execution or unsafe rendering - the field simply accepts text input as designed for an admin-only configuration.
evidence_summary: Screenshots show the Google Analytics 4 connector configuration in an admin Connectors panel. The Measurement ID field accepts the script tag text as literal string input. No errors, crashes, or actual XSS execution are shown - the application functions as designed for a freeform text configuration field accessible only to administrators.
scenario_id: Evoq.Content.GoogleAnalyticsConnector::Google Analytics 4 (GA4) Support::Special Characters and XSS Input Handling
